promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute basic cat steel-type pokemon wearing a grey crystal headband. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or cat. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crystafeline, a a chibi cute basic cat steel-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Damage Rush. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "cat", "steel" or "Crystafeline". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, cat-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Sparkling under desert sun, this pint-sized prowler uses Damage Rush to retaliate with toughness. A metallic feline of the sands.
